title: San Francisco/Civic Center-Tenderloin
name: Jardiniere
directions: at Grove St and Franklin St
hours: Dinner: Su-W 5PM-10:30PM, Th-Sa 5PM-11:30PM, hours are extended to accommodate neighborhood performances
content: French food in American style, quite pricey, great decor, appetizers, deserts, mixed reviews on entrees.  They have both an "Ã  la carte" and a "prix-fixe" menu.
